thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Zain

author: Zain
title: Zain
text: Out of the many flight booking services offered on the internet, Flighthub provides the most affordable options, with the lowest/none charges for using their services to book the flights. There are several options available for not-only insurance coverage, but also seat selection and trip planning. Their customer service was also excellent. I highly recommend flighthub for any online flight purchasing!
